'''Yanass''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Yanass was dispatched by [Sugaan](/sugaan/) to find a way inside [Hasongo](/hasongo/), so that his tribe of naga can attack and destroy the Rauataian garrison there. Instead, she only found death as Eothas connected with the luminous adra pillar at the fort.

}}

## =Quests

=
*  [A Distant Light](/aDistantLight/): She is instrumental in safely navigating through Sugaan.
